pages.text:
Welcome to
Our House!
Our Story
We’re all about you just being you. The first Miller’s Ale House opened in 1988, in Jupiter, Florida, as a local place to be enjoyed by all walks of life.
We are a sports-themed casual dining restaurant with 100+ locations in 10 states. A place where making friends is as easy as ordering your next beer. So whether you’re here to chill, cheer, chow down or get charged up, you’ll find a whole House full of friends and friends-to-be, ready to join in.
Since 1988
Our Mission and Core Values
We connect people through exceptional experiences, resulting in guest and team member loyalty, profitability, and growth.
1. Act with Integrity and Respect. All actions are based on transparency, honesty and empathy.
2. People First. Our business is founded on serving humanity, building authentic relationships with guests and each other.
3. Everyone owns guest loyalty. All Team Members are empowered to ensure the return of every guest.
4. Relentless drive for excellence. We are committed to consistently delivering exceptional food, beverage and service.
5. We support and hold each other accountable. Each of us is responsible for the success of ourselves, teammates and the business.
6. Engage Community. Everyone makes a positive impact inside and outside our House.
What to Expect
We serve a wide variety of entrees, burgers, salads and sandwiches, plus weekday lunch and dinner specials, in a lively atmosphere. You’ll love our large portions, great prices, warm service, and shareable appetizers.
Our full-service bar offers over 35 beers on tap and a large selection of signature cocktails and pitchers.
What We're Known For
We are known for our famous buttermilk-drenched, hand-breaded boneless chicken Zingers
®
and Zingers Mountain Melt
®
, tossed in your choice of sauces.
Miller’s Ale House now has
114
locations in 10 states.

Why Guests Love Miller's Ale House
You can’t go wrong with Miller’s Ale House. I’ve never found anything there that I disliked. Their food is amazing and I would recommend it to anybody.
Donna from Jacksonville
Great place for beers and food. Lots of TVs to catch your favorite games. Great burgers and many weekdays specials.
Marx from Miami
Never pass up a Zinger Mountain Melt! Everything is so good here, from appetizers to desserts!
Ryan from Mt. Laurel
Join Our Team
Career Opportunities
Our success depends on the success of those who work at our House. A place where you’ll feel connected, valued, challenged and have the opportunity for personal and professional growth. We’re here and growing!
View Careers
Welcome to
Our House!

Got feedback or a request?
We wanna hear it. Let us know what we did right, how we can improve or any request you may have. We value your candid feedback and appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts. To provide us with your feedback please complete the survey below.
We appreciate your feedback and strive to continuously improve our services based on your suggestions. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us!
